alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Jefferson; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Blount, southeastern Jefferson, southwestern Cocke and Sevier Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Eagleton Village, or 12 miles east of Maryville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Dandridge, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Townsend, Walland and Bird Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Jefferson; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains
